StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetDistricts]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
SELECT ORGANIZATION_ID, SHORT_NAME FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION WHERE ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'D' -- return '1MCD' with list of districts AND (ISOPEN = 'Y' OR SHORT_NAME = '1MCD') AND DELETED != 'Y' ORDER BY ORGANIZATION_ID
